details: Selected to participate in the Japan Internship Program 2023 hosted by the Ministry of Economy Trade and Industry (METI) of Japan, a program to find foreign talents to work with local businesses on-site in Japan for 2 months. Selected from 10,000 applicants across Asian countries.
Worked at Manba Kogen Lodge, a local guesthouse in northern Hyogo province.
Designed the promotional website and implemented it with the website builder Wix.
Wrote copywriting and website content in English and translated the website to Thai.
Developed and designed the architecture of internal products for the job-hunting platform JobThai.
Participated in Frontend Development with NextJS and Backend with Express.
Designed new features for a mobile app on both Android and iOS, taking into account the design systems and standards of each platform.
Achieved a high satisfactory product by coordinating closely with the client and refining the design per request.

projects.name: CEDT Internship Portal
projects.details: Internal system for students to discover and apply to internships facilitated by Chulalongkorn University's Computer Engineering Department.

projects.name: CU Get Reg
projects.details: A student-run planning tool for Chulalongkorn University's course registration, used widely by more than 36,000 students. This product aggregates course data from multiple sources to one place, with additional features such as course searching, filtering, reviews, and automatic class timetable visualization.

projects.name: natTP Blog
projects.details: Personal writing space designed to reflect Nattamon's identity. Made with Gatsby and TailwindCSS and uses Strapi as the backend CMS. Made assets and illustration. Posts articles on literature, art, and dev/design.

projects.name: Fixed Assets Tracking System using NFC Technology
projects.details: Senior Project, a new feature of the existing asset tracking application VERSCAN, in collaboration with House of Dev Technology.

projects.name: Droplet Simulation with Three.js
projects.details: Attempting to simulate the appearance and motion of liquid droplets on a smooth ramped surface from scratch.

projects.name: Operation Bifrost
projects.details: A mod translating the Japanese Visual Novel game STEINS;GATE into Thai.

projects.name: Detection of Abandoned Objects in Surveillance Video to Prevent Bombing Situations
projects.details: High School Senior Project, proposed a method of detecting abandoned objects using OpenCV, then classifying the risk level of each object using Bayesian Machine Learning.

activities.name: Core Team at Thinc.
activities.details: Lead in organizing tech-related events and university-scale software development projects as a student run organization.

activities.name: Core Team, 19th Young Webmaster Camp and 12th Junior Webmaster Camp
activities.details: In charge of brand identity, graphic & web design, marketing, and media relations. Run operations as staff on the event date.

activities.name: UX/UI Designer, Student Government of Chulalongkorn University
activities.details: Designed websites to be used as a part of Student Government activities, such as registration systems, online interactive experiences, and blogs. Guided junior members in the team, and oversaw the finished products of each project. Took part in front-end development with React.

activities.name: Frontend Developer, Engineering Student Committee
activities.details: Designed and developed systems to assist the ESC's activities, including a registration system and room reservation system, with React.

activities.name: CU Chorus
activities.details: Member of Chulalongkorn University Chorus Club. Core team in the academic year 2020, in charge of public relations.

activities.name: CU Pen Club
activities.details: Member of Chulalongkorn University Literature Club (also known as CU Pen Club). Core team in the academic years 2020-2021. Participated in club activites as writer, illustrator, editor, and organized literary events.
